TopicTitle: VBulletin Forums as active archive for 6 months

Articles.Content:
I would formally like to request that the VBulletin Forums be stood back up for a period of 6 months as an active archive, lock them so nobody can post, but allow us to search and gather the stuff that is missing or broken, rename them but allow us to gather our subscription lists and any blogs or posts that didn't make it across. I don't think this is an unreasonable request and would go a long way in quelling the dislike for the new Forum Software please consider this.

 

VG
Not only for 6 months. Forever. Maybe even keep the old forum completely but moderated by other people and not official anymore.
I dont think they would agree to forever but we maybe able to get a limited time period to extract any missing data
Unfortunately not possible due to technical issues (vBulletin is stubborn about thinking it's installed to forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com, while it isn't anymore). Closing this thread.
